<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.QueryRewriteAjax</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>QueryRewriteAjax</name> <script><![CDATA[var QueryRewriteAjax = Class.create(); QueryRewriteAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, { getExampleRewrite: function() { var query = this.getParameter('sysparm_query'); var lookup = this.getParameter('sysparm_lookup'); var replacement = this.getParameter('sysparm_replacement'); return SNC.RegexReplacementRewrite.apply(query, lookup, replacement); },
type: 'QueryRewriteAjax' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-02-14 17:17:17</sys_created_on> <sys_id>04bf2da6eb100210c6b6e5b26b5228ad</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>QueryRewriteAjax</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Query stats" source="com.glide.stats.query">0bb634a43cb1311068bcf327dfe37f44</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_04bf2da6eb100210c6b6e5b26b5228ad</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-02-14 17:17:17</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
